problems.title: Print Odd Numbers
problems.description:
Write a program to print all odd numbers between 1 to n using a while loop.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
Print odd numbers from 1 to n, each on a new line.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
10

Sample Output
1
3
5
7
9

Explanation:
Odd numbers between 1 and 10 are printed.
hintsList: Check if the counter is not divisible by 2.
Increment the counter in a loop.
